entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING , Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 8:30 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Wind: ESE 9 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 in the Wreckhouse area overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 100 except gusting to 120 in the Wreckhouse area. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to flurries overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 100 except gusting to 120 in the Wreckhouse area early in the evening. Wind becoming east 50 gusting to 70 in the evening then northeast 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
